item.description:
A couple of good friends of mine -- Kristen and Ryan -- are debuting at The Barking Crab this coming TUESDAY from 7:00-10:00pm.  Some of you may have seen them already upstairs at Durty Nelly's. They do acoustic rock covers and Kristen's voice is A-MAZING! Come on down for some after work live music entertainment and seafood! NO COVER!

The Barking Crab is located at Fort Point Landing.  Follow the link to take a gander at their scrumptious seafood selections.  Located convenient to the Red Line (South Station), Silver Line (Courthouse), and about a 10-min walk to the Orange and Blue Lines (State Street, Aquarium).

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO. 

Hope to see you there!

This event is crosslisted with Boston Happy Hour and Social Fun.
item.name: KNR Duo @ The Barking Crab LIVE MUSIC!
